q: help." Advertisement Ray LaHood said he will fly to Michigan on Tuesday to meet with Ford president and CEO Alan Mulally and Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne . A Ford spokesman, Mike Moran , said Alan Mulally accepted the request for a meeting and looks forward to seeing the secretary. A Chrysler spokeswoman confirmed the meeting, but declined to comment. " committee's paperwork says he'll be seeking the 15th District seat. But he now lives in the 11th District again and is registered to vote there, according to 2010 campaign spokesman Bill Lockyer Maxfield. Obviously, no one knows what the outcome of redistricting will be, though there has been significant coverage of the idea that districts should reflect communities of interest, Maxfield said. Joe Simitian , meanwhile, filed a Statement of Intention to run in 2012 for the 21st Assembly District seat won in November by freshman lawmaker Rich Gordon , D-Menlo Park.
